framework.utils

Class GraderSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.utils.GraderSettings

  • public class GraderSettings
extends Object
    This is used to set, get, save, and load settings related to the grader. This is a singleton, so you'll have to do the following GraderSettings.get() before invoking any method. It looks for the file named ".gradersettings" in the current working directory for the saved settings. TODO: Move the name of the filename to a configuration file
